content: पार्थिव {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (वी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [पृथिव्याः ईश्ररः इदं वा अण्] {@--1@} Earthen, earthly, terrestrial, relating to the earth; यतो रजः पार्थिवमुज्जिहीते <ls>R. 13. 64.</ls> {@--2@} Ruling the earth. {@--3@} Princely, royal. --वः {@--1@} An inhabitant of the earth. {@--2@} A king, sovereign; <ls>R. 8. 1.</ls> {@--3@} An earthen vessel. {@--4@} The body. --वं An earthly substance.
पार्थिवी {@--1@} An epithet of Sītā, daughter of the earth; पार्थिवीमुदवहद्रघूद्वहः <ls>R. 11. 54.</ls> {@--2@} An epithet of Lakṣmī.
